title: Unlocking the Path Towards AI-Native Networks with Optimized Lightweight Large Language Models
abstract: &lt;p&gt;In the rapidly advancing era of Artificial Intelligence&lt;br&gt;(AI), Large Language Models (LLMs) have emerged as a pivotal&lt;br&gt;force, revolutionizing the automated creation of diverse content.&lt;br&gt;At the same time, Machine Learning (ML), particularly Deep&lt;br&gt;Learning (DL), has achieved state-of-the-art (SoTA) performance&lt;br&gt;in optimization and inference tasks across various domains, including&lt;br&gt;telecommunications. However, the division of technological&lt;br&gt;domains poses challenges to the integration of powerful AI/ML&lt;br&gt;capabilities towards realizing the vision of &ldquo;AI-native&rdquo; networks,&lt;br&gt;such as future 6G networks, aiming to offer ubiquitous intelligence&lt;br&gt;across their infrastructure and service planes, seamlessly&lt;br&gt;adapting and evolving to support new application classes. The&lt;br&gt;paper proposes a novel out-of-the-box framework, TimesLM, for&lt;br&gt;automated time series analytics, which is particularly useful for&lt;br&gt;the Edge-Cloud orchestration framework CODECO, leveraging&lt;br&gt;Large Language Models (LLMs). It addresses the challenge&lt;br&gt;of developing general-purpose solutions by utilizing lightweight&lt;br&gt;LLMs as forecasters and optimizers. TimesLM offers zero-shot&lt;br&gt;and few-shot inference capabilities, enabling confident uncertainty&lt;br&gt;navigation for decision-making in AI-Native networks. Its architecture&lt;br&gt;integrates global optimization with lightweight LLMs,&lt;br&gt;followed by input enrichment and local prompt optimization.&lt;br&gt;Evaluation results on diverse real-world datasets demonstrate&lt;br&gt;improved accuracy and reduced latency, making TimesLM highly&lt;br&gt;competitive against SoTA approaches, while reducing operational&lt;br&gt;costs and carbon-footprint. A limitations analysis is also presented.&lt;br&gt;The proposed framework stands as a promising and sustainable&lt;br&gt;step towards realizing the envisioned capabilities of AI-Native&lt;br&gt;networks through LLM-powered time series analytics.&lt;/p&gt;
